name: Don't punish me!
description:
Story

Bobby's would really love to get the new Gamebert game. As he is a young boy, he still has to learn a lot. His mom tries her best to teach him, but unfortunately Bobby has to be punished over and over again. Will he achieve to play Gamebert?

How to play

Use Space to advance to the next screen.
Use 1, 2 or 3 to select the available options.
Use I to display previous information screen again while being at the selection screen.
